EN: Send the password to the username email
Shows wiki about the game. To get more information use "wiki"
Use "chat add <username>" to add chat with player. Use "chat remove <username>" to remove chat with player
Use "equip <item_name>" where "item name" type is armor, weapon or heal to equip your person
The name "{}" is busy or the password is incorrect
